text: Illicium kinabaluensis is a species of tree in the family Schisandraceae, or alternately, the Illiciaceae. It is endemic to Mount Kinabalu, the tallest mountain on Borneo. It grows in forests at an elevation of 1200 to 2000 meters.World Conservation Monitoring Centre. 1998. Illicium kinabaluensis. In: IUCN 2013. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2013.1.
